Title: Provides an exemption to the sale of plug-in hybrid electric vehicles from state sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Provides an exemption to the retail sale of plug-in hybrid electric vehicles from state sales and compensating use taxes; authorizes local governments to adopt similar incentives.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting the sale of plug-in hybrid electric vehicles from state sales and compensating use taxes, and to authorize cities and counties to grant such exemption
